client_inactive: If client to inactive will cause to set any trip and any trip bus assigned under this client as inactive.
trip_inactive: If trip to inactive will cause to set any trip bus assigned under this trip as inactive.
driver_inactive: If driver to inactive will cause to set any trip bus assigned under this driver as inactive.
bus_inactive: If bus to inactive will cause to set any trip bus assigned under this bus as inactive.
close_message: This bus will be running close to your time set. Will you proceed?
crash_message: Selected time set of this bus already exists.
